messages.content: David Chalmers is not your usual career politician. Winner of Queen’s Award for Enterprise in 2002. Successfully managed commercial operations of Economist Group in Asia Pacific for 10 years. Co-founded Kaleidoscope Trust. Lives in Appledore. Chairs Finance Committee on Northam Town Council. Governor of Petroc College. Chair of Local Diversity Charity – Sunrise.

This election will be the most important in a generation. Johnson’s Deal will lead to the break up of the United Kingdom. I will fight for fairer funding for schools and colleges in our area and more money for the NHS and social care. I will seek greater investment in our transport infrastructure and more affordable homes for our young people. I will ensure we tackle the climate emergency and will work tirelessly to give our local businesses and farmers the support and opportunities they need to take advantage of a forward-looking and progressive Britain.
